answers.answer: Hi I'm 37+1weeks  very excited about my.little baby only 13 days more because I'm going to have a schedule c section on January 23 :-) I'm so nervous its my 3 baby but the feeling its the same like.the 1 baby :-) !!!!
11 days! Still have so much to do! Haven't even bought a baby book yet cause I can't find the "right" one! Congrats :-)

I'm 35 +1 and everyday I go to the doctors could be the day due to IUGR. I've been none big anxiety ball for two weeks now. They would like to get me to 38 weeks but I'm hoping to call this quits by 37, I'm so over the hours of testing I go through twice a week.

Hey, I'm due on jan 25 but I found out yesterday they are going to induce me on jan 20. I'm nervous about it bc I had my last two naturally but they are doing this bc I had preeclampsia with my last pregnancy.

I'm 33 weeks not as close as yall but pretty close . this is my 5 th so I'm sure it will come.a lot faster than the other . Its kinda nerve racking just sitting here when I could hit  you at any time. but i can't wait I'm so tired feels like i don't get enough.sleep . what about yall
I always wake up in the middle of the night and always on my back. I fall asleep on my side though. I need more pillows :)

question: Oh my gosh I'm getting close and nervous.Anyone else this close?
title: 36 weeks tomorrow
